Gemma Collins has been exhibiting her fantastic figure at all the hottest event.

The former TOWIE star, 38, flaunted her three stone weight loss in her latest dazzling Instagram post she shared on Thursday.

GC displayed her slimmed-down waist in the cinched waistline of her silver gown which featured a wrap around detailing.

In her sassy fashion, the telly star oozed sensuality when she placed a hand on her hip while she posed with a scenic backdrop.

Gemma's corkscrew curls sprung up around her face and she applied heavy make-up.

(Image: Instagram)

The self-confessed diva accessorised with a grey chic handbag to match her dress and peep-toe heels.

She wrote in the caption: "Looking very forward to @deliveroo this evening and then onto @havenhousech to celebrate the amazing charity work for all the beautiful children."

It comes after the queen-of-memes admitted that she helps keep the pounds off by injecting controversial £250 weight loss jabs .

(Image: Instagram)

The reality TV queen said: "I definitely feel much better since losing weight and I have got more energy and stuff.

"When you eat rubbish food, you feel rubbish and when you eat healthy, it’s a lot better."

The TV star thanks Skinny Jab for "curbing her appetite" and maintaining her slimmer shape.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Getty)

Skinny jab has just opened a new London clinic with Gemma appearing as a guest of honour. The clinic offers a three-week programme for £250 to anyone between the ages of 18 and 76.

Clients will have to splash out an extra £135 each time for an extra jab. SkinnyJab claimed one injection should last between two and four weeks.

Gemma has maintained a slim figure after she lost weight following her Dancing On Ice appearance in January.

The blonde has been documenting her weight loss journey on Instagram with her profile of 1.5million admirers.

Often the reality star litters her Instagram with motivational quotes, slimmed-down snaps and pictures of her lavish lifestyle.
description: GC credited controversial Skinnyjab injections for helping her maintain her slimmer shape after losing three stone
